description: Situated in Rio de Janeiro, just 15 minutes' drive from Recreio Neighbourhood, Le Relais De Marambaia features 7 exclusive suites with a beautiful view of Restinga de Marambaia. All feature private balconies, air conditioning, LCD TVs and separate lounge areas. Some rooms have a private hot tub. Guests at Le Relais De Marambaia can enjoy a boat trip to the Marambaia mangroves, fishing at dawn, or the Marambaia Spa. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the hotel. The hotel features an a la carte restaurant serving regional seafood specialities. A daily breakfast with fresh fruits, juices and pastries is available.Read less

The Restaurant 365 serves international cuisine, plus Brazilian food and drinks at the bar. Use our meeting rooms for events. Relax in the swimming pool and gym, plus a kids space and ironing room. Your pet is welcome for a fee.accorhotels.comRead less

name: PortoBay Rio de Janeiro
description: Right on Copacabana beach in the spectacular city of Rio de Janeiro, hotel PortoBay Rio de Janeiro offers the best of both worlds - the marvellous city and the stunning view of the beach right at your feet. 117 rooms with private verandas or panoramic window views to get a feel for the intense life of Copacabana, the sound of the sea, sunrise over the ocean. diverse flavours in La Finestra, roof-top pool, exclusive beach service. The hotel's roof-top terrace on the 20th floor offers a spectacular panoramic view of the famous bay and major sights of Rio de Janeiro, with Copacabana beach in the foreground and Christ the Redeemer in the background. Modern, spacious and with new services, this area has a pool, massage room, two saunas, fitness centre and pool bar.iHotelier/iStayRead less

description: Facing Rio’s Recreio Beach, Hotel Atlantico Sul offers accommodation with beautiful sea views and a swimming pool. There is also a bar, and restaurant on site that especializes in Brazilian cuisine. The rooms are bright and airy and offer panoramic beachfront views. They have air conditioning, cable TV and a minibar. The private bathrooms feature a shower. Hotel Atlantico Sul is set within 40 km of the Santos Dumont Airport and the Rio de Janeiro Bus Terminal. Barra Shopping Centre is a 25-minute drive away. Central Rio de Janeiro is 50 km away. Both, Riocentro Convention Centre and Barra Olympic Park are 10 km from the property.Read less

description: Offering a year-round outdoor pool and views of the sea, Vila Santa Teresa Hotel & Spa is situated in the Santa Teresa district in Rio de Janeiro. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms have a seating area for your convenience. Some units include views of the garden or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is included and there is a 24-hour front desk at the property. You can play tennis at the hotel. Christ the Redeemer is 2.5 km from Vila Santa Teresa Hotel & Spa, while Corcovado is 2.6 km from the property. Guests can enjoy a wellness centre, as well as taste the recipes at the guesthouse´s a la carte restaurant. Wi-Fi connection is free. Some of the charming rooms at La Suite features a balcony and a king size bed. They are air conditioned and come with a king size bed, wardrobe, Ipod docking station and private bathrooms. Selected units boasts scenic sea views. Spa facilities include massages and esthetic treatments. The guest house is 17 km from Riocentro Convention Centre, 10 km from Leblon Beach and 24 km from Maracanã Stadium. Santos Dumont Airport is 25 km away. name: Cdesign Hotel

name: Emiliano Rio
description: Boasting an outdoor infinity pool, Emiliano Rio is set in a privileged location in Rio de Janeiro, beachfront to Copacabana Beach. The contemporary architecture values the natural light and the sea view, offering guests a special and unique connection with the city. Free WiFi is provided, and private parking is available on site. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. Some rooms have a seating area for guests' convenience. Every room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and bidet, with bathrobes provided. It is also fitted with slippers, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Emiliano Rio, guests can taste a contemporary Brazilian cuisine made from organic products at the on-site restaurant. Other hotel facilities include a spa where guests can relax and a fitness centre where they can exercise. The rooftop boasts a swimming pool and views to the beach. Ipanema Beach is 1.2 km from Emiliano Rio, while the famous Sugarloaf Mountain is 7.5 km away, and Christ The Redeemer is at a distance of 8.4 km. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 8 km from the property, while Galeão International Airport is 20 km away.Read less

name: Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro
description: Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL is ideally set right in front of São Conrado beach and offers an unique option for those looking for the luxury of an urban resort. The hotel is located within the grounds of a historic building, designed by Oscar Niemeyer and surrounded by Burle Marx gardens. The hotel has an outdoor pool, a spa and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy exclusive drinks and sophisticated tapas at the Bardot Pool Bar, and also benefit from the contemporary cuisine restaurant Sereia. WiFi is available throughout the property All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL are decorated in warm colors and offer Trussardi bed linen, LED TV, minibar, digital safe and a dock station. Ensuite bathroom offers complimentary amenities, bathrobes and hairdryer. São Conrado subway station is only 750 metres from the property. Pedra da Gávea and Jardim Botanico can be both reached within 6.5 km. Copacabana beach is 11 km from Hotel Nacional Rio de Janeiro - OFICIAL. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 13 km from the property, while Tom Jobim International Airport is 25 km away.Read less

Parking is provided on site, subject to availability. At the Skylab Restaurant and Bar, located on the 30th floor, guests can taste Brazilian and international cuisine, as well as a tradicional 'feijoada' every Saturday. address: Escada Flora Mai, 177, Rio de Janeiro 22611-120
description: Featuring pool views, CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa provides accommodation with a bar, barbecue facilities and a shared lounge, around 300 metres from Joatinga Beach. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The restaurant serves African and American dishes, as well as Argentinian and Brazilian cuisine. Providing a terrace, some units are air conditioned and include a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. Some units feature a balcony and/or a patio with sea views and an outdoor dining area. At the homestay, some units are allergy-free. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. Guests can make the most of the garden, pool with a view and yoga classes on offer at the homestay. Bike hire and car hire are available at CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa and the area is popular for cycling and pub crawls. A baby safety gate is also available for guests at the accommodation. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 13 km from CLIFFSIDE - Boutique Hotel & Spa, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont, 23 km from the homestay, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.Read less

name: Hotel Caracas Rio
address: Praia da Guanabara, 633, Rio de Janeiro
description: Hotel Caracas Rio is located on Praia de Guanabara Beach and is just a 10-minute drive from the Ilha Plaza Shopping Centre. It features modern rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. Antonio Carlos Jobim International Airport is just 5 km from the hotel. Caracas Rio Hotel offers rooms with an LCD TV, a telephone and a private bathroom. Tastefully styled, they provide white linens and wooden décor. Some rooms offer extra luxury and include a living room and a minibar. Fresh fruits, breads and cold meats are served on the breakfast buffet, as well as tea, coffee and juices. A variety of dishes and drinks can also be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant and bar lounge. Guests can utilise the business centre and take advantage of room service. 24-hour reception and a laundry facility are available and a concierge is always at hand to assist with any needs travellers may have. Tom Jobim International Airport is located 8 km from the property.Read less

name: 439 Barrabela
address: Av. Lucio Costa 4700, Apto 439, Rio de Janeiro 22630-011
description: 439 Barrabela offers a beachfront apartment in Barra da Tijuca. Guests can enjoy a view to the ocean whilst relaxing by the pool. Other facilities at 439 Barrabela include a hot tub and a sauna. Free WiFi is available throughout. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a microwave and a toaster. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is provided. The room and the living room are fitted with a split air conditioning. Bathroom is fitted with a shower. Free private parking is available on site. Barra Shopping is within 2 km. Santos Dumont Airport is 20 km away and Galeão International Airport is 25 km away.

name: Pousada Cantinho do Joá
address: 680 Rua Presciliano da Silva Casa de pedra, Rio de Janeiro 22611-130
description: Featuring a bar, garden and views of lake, Pousada Cantinho do Joá is located in Rio de Janeiro, 300 metres from Joatinga Beach. The property is situated 350 metres from Barra da Tijuca, 3.3 km from Pedra Bonita and 6 km from Tijuca Forest National Park. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house each room is fitted with a private bathroom. Guests at Pousada Cantinho do Joá can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 9 km from the accommodation, while Rodrigo de Freitas Lake is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Santos Dumont Airport, 17 km from Pousada Cantinho do Joá.

name: Apartamento Marina
address: Estrada Do Pontal, 7100 apto 220, Rio de Janeiro 22790-877
description: Located in Rio de Janeiro with Pontal Beach and Recreio dos Bandeirantes nearby, Apartamento Marina features accommodation with free private parking, as well as access to a hot spring bath. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The aparthotel provides a pool with a view with a pool bar, as well as a sauna and a shared kitchen. The aparthotel is equipped with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. The property offers mountain views. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. A children's playground is also available at the aparthotel, while guests can also relax in the garden. Macumba Beach is 700 metres from Apartamento Marina, while Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 42 km from the accommodation.

name: pousada do rei
description: Situated in Pedra de Guaratiba, pousada do rei offers beachfront accommodation 48 km from Rio de Janeiro Botanical Gardens and features various facilities, such as an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a restaurant. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and room service for guests. At the inn, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Pousada do rei offers some rooms with sea views, and rooms are fitted with a balcony. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide advice at the reception. The nearest airport is Rio de Janeiro/Galeao International Airport, 59 km from pousada do rei.

name: Lk Design Hotel
description: LK Design Hotel Florianópolis in Florianópolis features 5-star accommodation with a restaurant, a fitness centre and a bar. The property is around 3.7 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall and 6 km from Floripa Mall. Casa Açoriana Handcraft is 10 km from the hotel and Campeche Island is 13 km away. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking both English and Portuguese, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Beiramar Mall is 800 metres from LK Design Hotel Florianópolis, while Rosario Steps is less than 1 km from the property. When booking [5] rooms or more, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: Il Campanario Villaggio Resort
description: Il Campanário Villaggio Resort has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Florianópolis. The property is situated 200 metres from Jurere Beach, 2.3 km from Praia do Forte and 2.4 km from Jurerê Tradicional. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a balcony. At Il Campanário Villaggio Resort the rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Floripa Mall is 16 km from Il Campanário Villaggio Resort, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Faial Prime Suítes
description: Hotel Faial is a modern city hotel conveniently situated in the heart of Florianopolis, only 15 km from Florianopolis Hercilio Luz Airport. It offers free WiFi and regional excursions. The pleasant rooms at the Faial are bright, with light colour décor. All are equipped with air conditioning, TV and a minibar. Bathrooms are private and include free toiletries. A daily breakfast buffet with tropical fruits, natural juices and on-demand hot dishes is available too. Hotel Faial is situated just 100 meters from the bus station. Guests inquire at the nearby bus station regarding adventure sports and regional hiking. Private parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Jurere Beach Village
description: Jurerê Beach Village offers air-conditioned rooms and leisure facilities that include an outdoor pool and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. All rooms have free WiFi and are air-conditioned, with amenities such as cable TV, an equipped kitchen and a private balcony. Guests can use their wet or dry sauna. Jurerê Beach Village also has a games room and massage service. Local and international cuisines are available in their on-site restaurants. Tropical cocktails and non-alcoholic drinks are served at the bar.

name: Slaviero  Ingleses Convention
description: Situated on Praia dos Ingleses, Slaviero Ingleses Convention offers an outside pool with sun loungers, free WiFi and private parking. All the rooms at the hotel are air conditioned and are equipped with a TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests can benefit from an on-site restaurant and a 24-hour front desk. The nearest airport is Hercílio Luz International Airport, 38.5 km from the property.

name: Palace Praia Hotel
address: Praça República do Líbano, Nº40, Florianopolis
description: Boasting an infinity pool and free WiFi, Palace Praia is a beachfront hotel located on the Canasvieiras beach, in the north of Florianópolis. It features direct access to the beach and free daily breakfast. It features modern rooms with a balcony, sea views, air conditioning, cable TV, a private bathroom and a kitchen with microwave and refrigerator. Palace Praia Hotel has a bar and restaurant. Guests can relax in the solarium and hot tub, both located on the hotel's roof. Private parking is available for an additional fee. Hotel Palace Praia is situated 21 km from the Florianópolis city centre and 30 km away from Hercilio Luz Airport.

name: Costa Norte Ponta Das Canas
description: This hotel is located right on the seafront of the peaceful Ponta das Canas Beach, where an idyllic landscape and the charm of a fishing colony await you. Breakfast and dinner are included in room rates. Costa Norte provides bright rooms with balconies that face either the ocean or the hotel's patio. The accommodations also feature cable TV, a minibar and air conditioning. Bathroom is private and extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Admire the coast while enjoying the outdoor hot tub and swimming pool, or relax in the spa and indoor pool. Your whole family can also keep in shape working out in the gym or having fun in the games room and on the playground. Services such as tours, car rentals and yoga classes are also provided at an additional charge. A TV room, computers with internet access and a tastefully decorated restaurant are also available on site.

name: Blue Tree Premium Florianopolis
description: Blue Tree Premium Florianópolis boasts an outdoor swimming pool with panoramic views of the city. Offering free WiFi, guests will also have a gym and a sauna available. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. All rooms at this Blue Tree Premium Florianópolis hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a minibar and a digital safe. Beira-Mar Shopping mall is 55 metres from Blue Tree Premium Florianópolis. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 14 km away.

name: Novotel Florianopolis
description: Novotel Florianópolis is perfect for guests looking to have an amazing time in the city. Beautifully decorated rooms for couples, single guests, and families. All with A/C and free WiFi. The Santa Cucina Restaurant serves Italian food in a welcoming environment. Our events room is great for lectures and coffee breaks. Enjoy our swimming pool, gym and the Aya Spa (with spa and massage room).accorhotels.com

name: Joaquina Beach Hotel
address: Av Pref Acacio Garibaldi S Thiago, 2323, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: Set within 1 minute away from the beach, Joaquina Beach Hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool and a sauna on site. Lagoa da Conceição Lagoon is located 2 km away. Free WiFi is offered in public areas and free private parking is available on site. Some rooms offer air-conditioning, and all rooms are equipped with a TV, minibar and safe. They are simply styled with tiled floors and provide a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast each morning in the breakfast room. It includes a variety of fresh fruits, breads and cold meats, as well as a selection of hot and cold drinks. Florianópolis centre is 17KM away from the property and Hercilio Luz Airport is located 15 km away.

name: Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel
description: Situated in Florianópolis, Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel is located on the oceanfront of Praia dos Ingleses, in Santa Catarina. It offers a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool, and an indoor pool. All are equipped with air conditioning, free WiFi, minibar, hairdryer, telephone, safety deposit box and flat-screen TV. At lunch and dinner times, the restaurant offers regional and international food as well as a special menu for children for a surcharge. At the 4-star Costa Norte Ingleses Hotel, guests can take advantage of a tennis court, games room, gym, and soccer, volleyball and basketball courts. A TV lounge, sauna, hot tub and spa treatments are also provided. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 21 km from the accommodation, while Campeche Island is 28 km away. The International Airport is about 39 km away from property.

name: Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras
description: Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras is situated in the Canasvieiras district of Florianópolis, 19 km from Floripa Mall, 24 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall and 37 km from Campeche Island. The accommodation is 12 km from Casa Açoriana Handcraft, and guests benefit from complimentary WiFi and private parking available on site. The air-conditioned apartment is composed of 1 separate bedroom, a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, and 1 bathroom. Waterpark Água Show is 7 km from the apartment, while Praia dos Ingleses is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 27 km from Hotel Monteiro Canasvieiras.

name: Pousada dos Sonhos
description: No description found

name: Majestic Palace Hotel
description: This 5-star hotel offers luxury accommodation, views of the North Bay, just minutes from Beiramar Shopping Mall, several beaches on the north, south and east of Santa Catarina Island. Rooms include LCD TVs, sea views through floor-to-ceiling windows, and Serta mattresses ensuring comfort. Guests can enjoy fine dining while taking in stunning views of the North Bay. For drinks, the hotel offers the Mezzanine Café and a bar. The hotel is non-smoking. The Majestic’s spa features dry and wet saunas and different massage rooms. Guests enjoy easy and fast access to Esteves Junior Square, Centrosul Convention Center, and the Hercílio Luz International Airport.

name: Canasvieiras Hotel
address: Av. Prof. Milton Leite da Costa, 825, Florianopolis 88054-230
description: Off Santa Catarina’s coast, the Canasvieiras Hotel offers direct beach access and a private, outdoor swimming pool with sea-facing sun loungers. All rooms feature cable TV and air conditioning. Each of the Canasvieiras’s bright rooms is equipped with tile flooring and en suite facilities. Room service is offered throughout the day. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the on site restaurant or relax in the Canasvieiras Hotel’s gardens. Car rental and a 24-hr reception are available at the hotel. The lively shops and restaurants of Florianópolis city centre are a 15-minute drive away. Hercilio Luz Airport is under 30 km from Canasvieiras.

name: Pousada Holiday
description: Situated on Canasvieiras' beachfront, Pousada Holiday is located north of Santa Catarina island and offers a practical accommodation with barbecue and laundry facilities. With gardens, it also has free parking and Wi-Fi connection. Apartments at Holiday Pousada offer air conditioning, a living room with sofa and a cable TV. The well-equipped kitchen features a microwave, an oven and a refrigerator. The private bathroom includes a shower. Some offer a sea view. Available to guests are kiosks in front of the beach. Also available to guests is barbecue facility and a garden area. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 33 km away. Downtown Florianópolis and its bus station are 27 km from the guest house. Jurerê International beach is within a 10-minute drive. Within a 5-minute walk guests can find bars and restaurants.

name: Cris Hotel
address: Av. Pref. Acacio Garibaldi S. Thiago, 2399, Florianopolis 88062-600
description: Located right on the sands of popular Joaquina Beach, Cris Hotel offers free WiFi throughout the property and private parking. It also provides a delicious daily buffet breakfast. With tiled floors and plenty of natural light, the accommodation at Cris Hotel includes a private bathroom, air conditioning, TV and minibar. Some rooms also feature a balcony with sea views. Other facilities offered at Cris Hotel include 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and also a TV area. Mole Beach and Conceição Lagoon are 1.5 km from this hotel. Hercílio Luz International Airport and Florianópolis city centre are both within 21 km.

name: Hotel Torres Da Cachoeira
description: Located on Cachoeira do Bom Jesus Beach, Hotel Torres da Cachoeira's design uses glass and natural light. It offers complete leisure activities including an outdoor pool with sun terrace. The El Faro Restaurant offers contemporary cuisine using fresh local ingredients, and has a tempting dessert table. The well-lit rooms at Hotel Torres are comfortable, decorated with neutral green and cream decor. All are equipped with air conditioning and a TV, while some offer spacious balconies with sea views. Hotel Torres da Cachoeira is 31km from Hercilio Luz Airport, and 9 km from exclusive Jurerê Beach. It offers free parking.

name: Pousada Vila Tamarindo
description: No description found

name: ApartHotel no Jurerê Beach Village
description: Located in Florianópolis, this welcoming apartment lets you experience it all. Jurere Beach is just a short walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 3-minute drive to Jurerê Open Shopping. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink on the balcony of this apartment, which also features a fitness center. As for the great indoors, you can try your hand at billiards, or enjoy the free WiFi and LED TV. This vacation rental features luggage storage, air conditioning, a roundtrip airport shuttle, and tour/ticket assistance. The kitchen is equipped with an espresso maker, a microwave, and cookware. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Pietra Flat
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and beach service, Flat Pietra provides spacious accommodation on the sands of Praia dos Ingleses Beach. Guests can also enjoy a drink at the bar or relax in the hot tub on site. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms feature sea views and flat-screen TVs with cable channels. They also have a kitchenette with a microwave, refrigerator and stove. The bathrooms come with a hot shower. The staff a Pietra is available 24h. They can also arrange boat and sightseeing tours, as well as shuttle service. Central Bairro dos Ingleses is 1 km from Flat Pietra, with various dining and shopping options. Florianópolis centre is 20 km away. You can get to Hercílio Luz Airport in 50 minutes by car.

name: Pousada Old Beach
description: No description found

name: Hotel Porto Sol Beach
address: Rua Das Buganvilias, 123 Praia Cachoeira de Bom Jesus, Florianopolis 88056-025
description: Boasting an outdoor pool and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Porto Sol Beach is on the beachfront and offers comfortable accommodation in Florianópolis. It features a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and organising tours for guests. All rooms at Hotel Porto Sol Beach feature a cable TV, air conditioning, a seating area and a modern, en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have a balcony with a sea view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Hotel Porto Sol Beach offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. You can play billiards, table tennis and tennis at the hotel. Praia de Canasvieiras is 350 metres from Hotel Porto Sol Beach, while Pontas das Canas Beach is 2.3 km away.

name: Palm Beach Apart Hotel
description: No description found

name: Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras
description: Set in Florianópolis, within 60 metres of Praia de Canasvieiras and 800 metres of Praia da Cachoeira do Bom Jesus, Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras offers accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a concierge service, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Some rooms come with a kitchen with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. You can play billiards at Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras, and the area is popular for hiking and fishing. Canajure Beach is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Floripa Mall is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International, 34 km from Lançamento Pousada Monteiro Canasvieiras, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Costao do Santinho Resort
description: This award-winning resort on Florianópolis´s Santinho Beach is surrounded by native forest and archaeological sites. It features 6 restaurants which 5 have all incluvise, and a luxury spa. Sports facilities include swimming pools, and tennis. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The accommodation at Costao do Santinho Resort offers garden views or sea view, TV and ambiance music. Some rooms have a barbecue and all rooms have private parking. A children´s club organizes monitored activities. For guests of all ages, there are visits to the wildlife sanctuary Morro das Aranhas Mount. In addition, the resort hosts performances by popular Brazilian singers. The spa provides several choices for treatments, from detox to talassotherapy. Guests can have a relaxation massage or a hydromassage session. A beauty salon is available too. As for gastronomy, the casual Rancho do Pescador specializes in seafood recipes from the Azores and Santa Catarina, and Nossa Senhora Vitória features an international contemporary menu. Other options include Italian food, Japanese food and barbecue. The Rancho do Pescador is not part of the all inclusive. Costao do Santinho has been awarded as best beach resort in Brazil 7 times

name: Pousada Mar de Dentro
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 90 metres from Praia de Santo Antônio de Lisboa, Pousada Mar de Dentro features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a garden. Located around 2.8 km from Praia de Sambaqui, the inn with free WiFi is also 5.8 km away from Floripa Mall. The property is non-smoking and is located 2 km from Praia de Cacupé. At the inn, the rooms include a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Pousada Mar de Dentro have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also feature a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Pousada Mar de Dentro offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 11 km from the inn, while Campeche Island is 24 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 21 km from Pousada Mar de Dentro.

name: Iate Hotel Florianópolis
description: Offering a restaurant, bar, and a fitness centre, Iate Hotel Florianópolis is located in Florianópolis. This hotel is conveniently located 500 metres from the city centre, and free WiFi access is available. These air conditioned rooms are bright, spacious and elegantly furnished. Each room features a desk, flat-screen cable TV, and a minibar. A hearty buffet breakfast is provided every morning, and the restaurant serves regional and international cuisine. Victor Meirelles Museum is 1.3 km from Iate Hotel Florianópolis, and the Santa Catarina Museum is 8 minutes by taxi. Several city parks are reachable within a 10-minute walk. Centro Sul Convention Centre is 700 metres from this property. A bus station is located 500 metres from the door, and the Hercílio Luz International Airport is 13 km from the hotel.

name: Hibisco Guest House
description: Providing sea views, Hibisco Guest House is located in the Campeche district of Florianópolis, 60 metres from Praia do Campeche and 1.4 km from Praia do Morro das Pedras. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a picnic area. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Guests can have wine or champagne delivered to their room. At the bed and breakfast, all units have bed linen and towels. There is a coffee shop, bar and lounge. Guests at the bed and breakfast can make the most of yoga classes offered on-site. Guests at Hibisco Guest House will be able to enjoy activities in and around Florianópolis, like hiking and bike tours. Campeche Island is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 7 km from Hibisco Guest House.

name: Parador Campeche
description: Located in Florianópolis, within 600 metres of Praia do Campeche and less than 1 km of Campeche Island, Parador Campeche provides accommodation with a garden and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is non-smoking and is situated 14 km from Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall. At the inn, the rooms are fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at Parador Campeche have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. Floripa Mall is 19 km from Parador Campeche, while Aderbal Ramos da Silva Stadium is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 12 km from the inn.

name: Intercity Florianopolis
description: Intercity Florianopolis is centrally located and offers easy access to Florianopolis's beaches. It provides accommodation with free internet, swimming pools, a gym and a restaurant. The modern rooms at Intercity Florianopolis are air-conditioned and soundproofed. All include an LCD TV with cable channels, minibar and safe. Rooms for disabled guests are available. An extensive breakfast buffet and lunch is served in the hotel´s Restaurante & Solarium restaurant. This hotel is located 500 metres from the Public Market and features private parking on site.

name: Pousada Estrelas no Mar
address: Praia do Pântano do Sul, 240, Florianopolis 88067-105
description: No description found

name: Residencial Costa Esmeralda
description: Located 6 km from Canasvieiras beach, Residencial Cachoeira do Bom Jesus offers units with a full kitchenette and free parking. The building features an outdoor pool, garden, barbecue facility, playground, and a private beach for guests. The units at Residencial Cachoeira do Bom Jesus provide a private bathroom fitted with a shower. The kitchenette includes a refrigerator, stove, oven, kitchenware and microwave. Jurerê Internacional beach is 7 km away. Praia dos Ingleses beach is 10 km from this apart hotel. Florianópolis city centre is 27 km from the property. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 45 km from this property.

name: Ingleses Praia Hotel
description: Located by Ingleses beach in Florianópolis, Ingleses Praia Hotel offers an outdoor pool and indoor pool with sauna. Guests can enjoy their beach service and relax by the sea. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property. The accommodations are air conditioned and have a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some categories have a sea view and a kitchenette. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 39 km from the property.

name: Pousada Mar de Cristal
address: Rua Servidao Mar de Cristal, 300 (Praia do Santinho), Florianopolis 88058-828
description: Just 500 metres from Santinho Beach, Pousada Mar de Cristal offers furnished loft-style apartments with free Wi-Fi. A supermarket and a bakery are ideally located 300 metres away. All apartments at Pousada Mar de Cristal feature a balcony with a sea view and are equipped with air conditioning. They are bright and spacious and provide a fully equipped kitchen, seating area and a bathroom. Hercilio Luz International Airport can be reached within a 30-minute drive and on-site private parking is free. Florianópolis city centre and bus terminal are 36 km away.

name: Pousada Bangalôs Da Mole - Florianópolis
address: Rod Jornalista Manoel De Menezes, 1007, Florianopolis 88061-700
description: Located in front of Florianópolis’ famous Praia Mole Beach, Pousada Bangalôs Da Mole - Florianópolis offers spacious rooms and free Wi-Fi. Free parking is available on site. The bungalows feature a seating area with a sofa and TV. Some boast a balcony with sea views. All bungalows are air-conditioned. The dunes at Praia da Joaquina Beach are 5 km from the guesthouse. Florianópolis centre is 19 km away, as well as its bus terminal. Bangalôs da Mole is 21 km from Hercilio Luz airport.

name: Holiday Florianópolis - 267B
description: Located in Florianópolis in the Santa Catarina Island region and Ingleses Beach reachable within 200 metres, Holiday Florianópolis - 267B provides accommodation with free WiFi, a children's playground, water sports facilities and free private parking. The air-conditioned accommodation is 2.7 km from Brava Beach. Guests have access to a sauna, steam room and can also attend fitness classes. The spacious aparthotel with a balcony and sea views features 2 bedrooms, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 2 bathrooms with a shower. Towels and bed linen are featured in the aparthotel. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and is protected by full-day security. Guests can chill out in the on-site bar, while a grocery delivery service is also available. You can play billiards and table tennis at the aparthotel, and the area is popular for fishing and hiking. Kids pool is also available at Holiday Florianópolis - 267B, while guests can also relax in the garden. Floripa Mall is 25 km from the accommodation, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 30 km away. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 40 km from Holiday Florianópolis - 267B.

name: Pousada Prainha da Nina
description: No description found

name: Pousada Ponta do Lago
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 100 metres from Pontas das Canas Beach, Pousada Ponta do Lago features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a garden and water sports facilities. The property is set 1 km from Praia da Lagoinha, 1.6 km from Brava and 15 km from Casa Açoriana Handcraft. The property has an indoor pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a 24-hour front desk. At the inn, the rooms come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with air conditioning, and some units at Pousada Ponta do Lago have a patio. All rooms will provide guests with a minibar. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Floripa Mall is 19 km from Pousada Ponta do Lago, while Iguatemi Florianopolis Shopping Mall is 23 km from the property.

name: Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio
description: Situated in Florianópolis, 200 metres from Jurere Beach, Il Campanário Jurerê Internacional - Studio features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. The accommodation offers air conditioning and a balcony with a view and others with balconies overlooking the pool or the neighborhood. If you feel like visiting the surroundings, check out Santa Catarina Island (24.4 km) and Joaquina Beach (27.6 km).Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport is located 31 km away.

The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 29 km from Ingleses Park Hotel.

Rooms at the Hotel Sete Ilhas are decorated with designer furnishings and a 26-inch flat-screen cable TV. Each includes a lounge, a kitchenette and a dining area. Guests can cook their own meal or enjoy a selection of dishes from the region, served at the restaurant of the hotel. They can also discover many nearby bars and cafes. Sete Ilhas hotel is located 23 km from central Florianópolis. Free private parking is available on site.

description: Ideally located just one block from Canasvieiras Beach, Ilhasul Hotel Residencia offers adult and children pools, a deck with sun loungers and a terrace with chairs and tables overlooking the street. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and private parking is possible on site. The air-conditioned apartments are fitted with a seating area, a kitchen with a refrigerator, stove, and utensils. There is also a TV and a private bathroom with a hot shower. Wi-Fi is free. Other facilities at the property include a 24-hour front desk,barbecue facilities and a shared lounge. The hotel is located 5 km from Jurerê Internacional Beach and 20 km from Florianópolis centre and bus terminal. Hercílio Luz Airport is 30 km away and free private parking is provided.

Floripa Mall is 15 km from Residencial, while Joaquina Beach is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Florianopolis-Hercilio Luz International Airport, 28 km from the property.

description: Located on Praia Mole in Florianópolis -SC, Residencial Cabanas da Praia Mole offers simple but very cozy accommodation amidst a vast green area. In the vicinity of the Residencial, guests have easy and quick access to several beaches, bars, restaurants and markets. The property is 5 km from the Joaquina dunes, 7 km from Lagoa da Conceição and 17 km from the center of Florianópolis. Hercílio Luz International Airport is 23 km from the accommodation. Wi-Fi is available free of charge in common areas. Breakfast is included on weekdays.

Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. Some units at the property have a balcony with a sea view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at Ingleses Palace Hotel. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with an indoor pool, sauna and hot tub. You can play billiards at Ingleses Palace Hotel. Santinho Beach is 2.5 km from the hotel, while Floripa Mall is 24 km from the property. Pelourinho is 500 metres from Fera Palace Hotel, while San Francisco church is 500 metres away. Luis Eduardo Magalhães Airport is 21 km from the property.

name: Hotel Bahia Do Sol
description: Set 1.5 km from Porto da Barra beach, Hotel Bahia do Sol is located in a prime location in the Vitoria district of Salvador. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. Salvador’s Pelourinho historic centre is 2 km away. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. All spacious rooms at Hotel Bahia do Sol feature a private bathroom, a minibar and a flat-screen TV. Many offer wonderful ocean views. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Hotel Bahia do Sol. This hotel is 4 km from Fonte Nova Stadium, and 32 km from Deputado Luís Eduardo Magalhães international airport. Guests can explore interesting museums and theatres of the Corridor of Victory, or spend a lazy day on Salvador's beautiful beaches.

name: Praia a Vista Salvador Hotel
description: Located right across Salvador´s Amaralina Beach, Praia a Vista Salvador Hotel features a restaurant that offers breakfast. Accommodation is in modern rooms, including free Wi-Fi and free private parking. Praia a Vista Salvador Hotel has air-conditioned rooms fitted with TV, minibar, telephone and safe. All of them provide ensuite bathroom, and some also feature sea view. Guests enjoy every morning a typical buffet breakfast, consisting of tropical fruit, fresh bread rolls and sweet pastries. Praia a Vista Salvador Hotel provides guests with 24-hour front desk and laundry. It is situated next to traditional Rio Vermelho district, a 10-minute drive from Bahia Convention Centre.

name: Marano Hotel
address: Av. Manoel Dias da Silva, 2495, Salvador 41830-001
description: Set in Salvador and just a few minutes from Pituba Beach, this 4-star hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and sea views. Free Wi-Fi is offered, as well as private parking. All of the air conditioned rooms feature a TV with cable channels, a minibar, a working area and a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Some rooms also include sea views, a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Guests benefit from a restaurant and a bar, both on site, a 24-hour front desk and a coffee shop. You will find several shops and restaurants in the surroundings of this hotel. Pelourinho and Farol da Barra are both 12 km from the property, while Shopping da Bahia and Shopping Salvador are just 5 km away. The nearest airport is Salvador/Deputado Luís Eduardo Magalhães International Airport, set 22 km from Marano Hotel.

name: Monte Pascoal Praia Hotel Salvador
description: The Monte Pascoal Praia Hotel Salvador is located on the seafront of the famous Farol da Barra Beach, which you can admire from the balcony of your room and from the swimming pool. All rooms are equipped with a 50" 4K TV with cable channels, air conditioning and a minibar. They also boast a balcony and offer a safe and work desk. Guest can also take advantaged of the beach service, which includes sun loungers and sunshades. Next to the pool, the Terra Vista Restaurant offers a breakfast buffet with more than 80 different items, including traditional Bahian specialties, such as tapioca, cuz cuz and beiju. At lunch and dinner times, you can choose from a varied menu with regional and international specialties while admiring beautiful sea views. The hotel is only a few blocks from the popular Barra Lighthouse and Barra Shopping Mall. It is also a privileged spot to watch the lively Carnival parade and to reach shops, bars and restaurants on foot. Monte Pascoal Praia Hotel Salvador also offers privileged views during the city's New Year's and Carnaval celebrations.

name: Hotel Catharina Paraguaçu
description: Set in a restored and enlarged antique 19th century residence, Hotel Catharina Paraguaçu offers rooms with air conditioning and cable TV. Rio Vermelho Beach is only a 10-minute walk away. All rooms of Catharina Paraguaçu Hotel are equipped with a minibar, a private bathroom, and a balcony or patio. Every morning a typical Bahian breakfast buffet is served in the breakfast room. Guests can benefit from the 24-hour front desk service Hotel Catharina Paraguaçu provides. It also has a tour desk and a car rental service. Free private parking is possible on site based on availability. The bus station is only 6 km away, and the Luis Eduardo Magalhães Airport is just 23 km away.

name: Hotel Verdemar
description: Hotel Verdemar is located in Salvador, right by Pituba Beach and offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi. Parking is also free of charge. Rooms at Verdemar are decorated with colourful bedding and framed artwork, providing TV, telephone and minibar. Room service is available for additional convenience. Guests enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with tropical fruit, juices, regional specialities and cakes. Hotel amenities include a cyber cafe and a 24-hour front desk. Verdemar hotel is situated within 3 km from Shopping Iguatemi and Bahia Convention Centre. Itapuã Beach and the Pelourinho historical district are 10 km away.

name: Gran Hotel Stella Maris Urban Resort & Conventions
description: This is an urban resort with the glamour of a 4-star hotel, located on the seafront of Stella Maris Beach, one of the most beautiful beaches of Salvador. Staying at Gran Hotel Stella Maris Resort & Conventions, your whole family can enjoy the sun by the outdoor pools. A games room and a gym are available on site. Let your children get special attention in the Kids Club while you take some time off or surf the internet for free. The Gran Hotel Stella Maris serves a rich breakfast in their on-site restaurant. In the hotel, you will also find a Lobby Bar. Within a short walk, you can reach the popular Itapuã Beach and Abaeté Lagoon. The historical centre of Salvador is about 30 km away.The International Airport is only 7 km away.

name: apart hotel 2 quartos frente mar
description: Featuring sea views, apart hotel 2 quartos frente mar in Salvador features accommodation, a garden, a terrace and a bar. The accommodation is air conditioned and features a spa bath. Each unit has an equipped kitchen, a living room with a sofa bed and flat-screen TV and private bathroom with free toiletries and a hot tub. A fridge, an oven and microwave are also available, as well as a coffee machine. The aparthotel offers a range of wellness facilities including a sauna and a hot tub. Popular points of interest near apart hotel 2 quartos frente mar include Praia de Ondina, Praia da Sereia and Praia do Farol da Barra. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Apartamento no Ondina Apart Hotel
address: Avenida Oceânica, 2400 - Cond Ondina Apart-Hotel, Salvador 41950-000
description: Boasting a garden, bar and views of sea, Apartamento no Ondina Apart Hotel is situated in Salvador, 200 metres from Praia de Ondina. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The aparthotel features a pool with a view with a pool bar, as well as beauty services and a 24-hour front desk. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower. At the aparthotel, units include bed linen and towels. At the aparthotel, the family-friendly restaurant is open for lunch and specialises in Brazilian cuisine. Guests at Apartamento no Ondina Apart Hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Salvador, like cycling and hiking. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Praia da Sereia, Praia do Farol da Barra and Governament House. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 23 km from Apartamento no Ondina Apart Hotel.

name: Casa Di Vina Boutique Hotel
address: R. Flamengo, 44, Farol De Itapuã, Salvador 41635-480
description: Featuring sea views, CASA Di VINA Boutique Hotel offers suites with balconies and free WiFi right opposite Itapuã Beach. Casa de Vinicius de Moraes is a part of the hotel that features swimming pools, a playground and a beautiful garden. A breakfast buffet is served daily. Rooms at CASA Di VINA have air conditioning, hairdryer, minibar, safe and an LCD Cable TV. Most of the units also feature balconies with hammocks and sea view. The restaurant at CASA Di VINA Boutique Hotel offers a special seafood menu, meat, fresh pasta and casual dishes, and serves wines, beers and refreshing drinks. CASA Di VINA Boutique Hotel is set in the historical building where the poet Vinicius de Moraes lived, and also offers free parking and a handy 24-hour reception desk. The property is only 50 metres from Vinicius de Moraes Square and Parque das Dunas is 6 km away. CASA Di VINA Boutique Hotel is 9 km away from Luis Eduardo de Magalhães Airport.

name: Pousada Mar Aberto
description: No description found

name: Farol Barra Flat 202
address: Av.Oceânica, 409 Apto 202 - Edif. Farol Barra Flat, Salvador 40140-130
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the sea, Farol Barra Flat 202 is located on Salvador's Farol da Barra Beach in the Bahia Region. Barra's Lighthouse is 500 metres from the property. The accommodation has a flat-screen TV. There is also a kitchenette, equipped with a microwave. Towels and bed linen are offered. Farol Barra Flat 202 also includes a sun terrace. Pelourinho is 5.7 km from Farol Barra Flat 202, while Ondina Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Luis Eduardo Magalhães Airport, 31 km from the property.

name: Pousada Solaris
description: Pousada Solaris is located a 2-minute walk from Rio Vermelho Beach and offers a tour desk. Free Wi-Fi access is available. Fitted with tiled floors and wood bed frames, the rooms here come equipped with a TV, fan and private bathroom. Some rooms include air conditioning. At Pousada Solaris guests will find a 24-hour front desk. Laundry service is available for a surcharge. The property offers free parking. Rio Vermelho Shopping Mall is 300 metres away, and Buracão Beach is 500 metres away. Salvador bus station is at a distance of 6 km, while Deputado Luis Eduardo Magalhães International Airport is 22 km away.

name: Flat Barra
description: Set in Salvador, Flat Barra offers accommodation with rooftop pool, free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The air-conditioned accommodation is 700 metres from Porto da Barra. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests. The aparthotel with a patio and sea views features 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. The aparthotel offers bed linen, towels and housekeeping service. Guests can also relax in the garden. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Praia do Farol da Barra, Barra's Lighthouse and Bahia Iate Club. The nearest airport is Salvador International, 26 km from Flat Barra, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Farol Beach
description: No description found

name: Bahia Flat
description: Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a pool with a view, city view and a patio, Bahia Flat is set in Salvador. This beachfront property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and organising tours for guests. The aparthotel with a terrace and sea views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a walk-in shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the aparthotel. For added privacy, the accommodation has a private entrance and soundproofing. A restaurant, snack bar and bar can be found on-site. For guests with children, the aparthotel provides an indoor play area. A bicycle rental service is available at Bahia Flat. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Praia do Farol da Barra, Porto da Barra and Barra's Lighthouse. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 26 km from Bahia Flat.

name: Bahia Flat 301
description: Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a private pool, Bahia Flat 301 is set in Salvador. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The aparthotel offers a sun terrace and a 24-hour front desk. The aparthotel has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with sea views. The accommodation is non-smoking. A bar can be found on-site. Guests at the aparthotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Salvador, like cycling. Popular points of interest near Bahia Flat 301 include Praia do Farol da Barra, Porto da Barra and Barra's Lighthouse. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: Flat Privativo Sol Victoria Marina
address: Avenida Sete de Setembro, 2068 - Vitória Apartamento 2209, Salvador 40080-004
description: Situated in Salvador, 1.2 km from MAM Beach and 1.6 km from Porto da Barra, Flat Privativo Sol Victoria Marina offers a private beach area and air conditioning. This beachfront property offers access to free WiFi and free private parking. The pool features a pool bar and sea views. The 1-bedroom aparthotel features a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchenette with a fridge and stovetop, and 1 bathroom with bath. Towels and bed linen are available in the aparthotel. The property has an outdoor dining area. There is a snack bar and bar. Praia do Farol da Barra is 2.8 km from the aparthotel, while Barra's Lighthouse is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 25 km from Flat Privativo Sol Victoria Marina.

name: estudio
address: Rua Direita de Santo Antônio Terreo, Salvador 40301-280
description: Offering sea views, estudio is an accommodation set in Salvador, 2.7 km from Praia do Canta Galo and 1.1 km from Pelourinho. Both free WiFi and parking on-site are accessible at the guest house free of charge. Bonfim Church is 5.4 km away and Bus Central Station is 6.9 km from the guest house. Popular points of interest near estudio include Arena Fonte Nova, San Francisco church and Lacerda Elevator. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 22 km from the accommodation.

name: Hostal da Glau
description: Located in Salvador, within 400 metres of MAM Beach and 2.9 km of Porto da Barra, Hostal da Glau provides accommodation with a garden as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a terrace, the guest house is close to several noted attractions, around 1.8 km from Pelourinho, 1.8 km from San Francisco church and 1.5 km from Lacerda Elevator. The guest house features family rooms. Featuring a shared bathroom, units at the guest house also offer free WiFi, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony. Arena Fonte Nova is 2.8 km from the guest house, while Barra's Lighthouse is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Salvador International Airport, 24 km from Hostal da Glau.

name: Saint Tropez Praia Hotel
description: Located on Parracho Beach in Arraial D'ajuda, Porto Seguro, this 4-star hotel has rooms with a balcony and garden views. It also has a terrace with views of the sea. The charming and colorful rooms at the Saint Tropez Praia Hotel feature a TV, a private bathroom and a spacious balcony where guests can enjoy drinks. The Saint Tropez has an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by a lush garden. It also has a sauna and a massage room, where guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments. The hotel offers free private parking and free WiFi. You can play tennis at the hotel. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Pitinga Beach is 1.2 km from Saint Tropez Praia Hotel, while Eco Park is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Porto Seguro Airport, 7 km from Saint Tropez Praia Hotel.

name: Hotel D'sintra
description: Boasting 2 outdoor pools and a fitness centre on site, Hotel D`Sintra is located in one of most popular avenues in Balneario Camboriu, Atlantica Avenue, by Central Beach. It offers free WiFi in public areas and private parking for a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms are well-equipped with cable TV, a minibar and work desk. Bathroom is private and features a hairdryer. Hotel D'sintra also has a 24-front desk and a game room. Guests can also enjoy the on-site restaurant. Municipal Streets is 1.2 km from Hotel D'sintra, while Cable Car is 4.3 km away. Navegantes - Minister Victor Konder International Airport is 11 km from the property.

name: Hotel Boutique Ananas
description: No description found

name: Novotel Santos Gonzaga
description: Novotel Santos Gonzaga is perfect for those who want to get to know the city as a family. In an imposing building in the city, the hotel offers an incredible panoramic view of the Santos bay. In addition, guests can enjoy free Wi-Fi, swimming pool, dry sauna on the roof, fitness center, kids area for children to have fun and interactive table. The hotel also has a restaurant with an international menu, a rooftop bar with a varied menu of drinks and 3 rooms for events with up to 50 people.accorhotels.com

name: Vogal Luxury Beach Hotel & Spa
description: Beachfront Vogal Luxury Beach Hotel & SPA is located in the most exclusive area of Ponta Negra, where nature and urbanity walk in perfect harmony. Guests can enjoy 5 outdoor pools or relax at the Vogal SPA by L’Occitane. Facilities are intimate, tastefully decorated and signed by artists. All suites overlook the sea and offer a double bath and 600-thread Trussardi bed linen. Complimentary L'Occitane en Provence amenities are also available. Guests will benefit from butler services, guest relations and concierges services. They can also unwind with a welcome drink with Veuve Clicquot champagne, among other treats. Vogal Luxury Beach Hotel & SPA also features a french cuisine restaurant, Le Château and the Terraço Restaurant, offering exclusive regional dishes. Languages spoken at the reception include English and Portuguese, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. São Gonçalo do Amarante International Airport is 40 km away.

name: Kilombo Villas & Spa
description: Kilombo Villas & Spa offers 5 exclusive villas with 9 different types of accommodations. It is 7 km from Pipa Beach and features a large outdoor swimming pool, private beach and a personalized butler service. The 5 exclusive villas have a contemporary design and include a fully-equipped kitchenette and LCD cable TV. Each villas are air-conditioned and have large windows offering panoramic views. Each includes a sun terrace with a private hot tub. Guests can enjoy a variety of day trips such as dolphin watching, horse riding and kayaking. The Kibo Restaurant & Bar offers Brazilian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The resort is located 81 km from Natal and free parking is possible.

name: Palms Ponta Verde by Tropicalis
address: Eng. Mario De Gusmão, 1259, Ponta Verde, Maceió 57035-000
description: Tropicalis Hotel is a tasteful beach hotel one block from Ponta Verde Beach, in the centre of lively Maceió. The rooftop pool and decked sun terrace offer panoramic beach views. The floodlit rooms at Tropicalis Hotel have bright white décor with touches of light woods and tropical themed bedding. All are equipped with air conditioning, cable TV and queen-size beds. Guests at the Tropicalis can benefit from the hotel´s free Wi-Fi. Parking is also free but subject to availability. A daily breakfast buffet with tropical fruits, natural juices and pastries is available. The restaurant serves a variety of regional seafood dishes and exotic cocktails. Tropicalis Hotel is a 25-minute drive from Maceió Airport. It offers a convenient car rental service.

name: Iate Plaza Hotel
description: Located along the seafront of Mucuripe Beach, the 4-star Iate Plaza Hotel invites you to enjoy its modern architecture and comfortable rooms with balcony and great ocean views. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. You don’t need to leave the Iate Plaza Hotel to enjoy the sun and the breeze of the beach. In the hotel’s outdoor swimming pool, you can relax while admiring the sea and savoring a drink served by the poolside bar. Guests can benefit from a restaurant overlooking the sea,serving both international and regional dishes. Within a short walk, you will find a vast array of cultural attractions and leisure activities, such as the traditional Yacht Club, the English Bridge and the Central Market.

name: Brisamar Hotel & Spa São Luís
address: Av. Sao Marcos, No. 12, Ponta D'Areia, São Luiz 65075-000
description: Brisamar Hotel offers beach front accommodation in São Luis, Maranhão. Guests will have access to a sauna and a swimming pool. The comfortably furnished guest rooms have 24-hour room service and views of the sea. Brisamar’s restaurant serves regional, national and international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Brisamar Hotel is set between Ponta D’Areia Beach and Lagoa do Jansen. Marechal Cunha Machado International Airport is 16 km away.

name: Hardman Praia Hotel
description: Located on Manaíra Beach front, the Hardman Praia features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The hotel is minutes from downtown Joao Pessoa and 25 minutes driving from the airport. The spacious rooms of the hotel offer modern furnishings. Guests can benefit of a flat-screen TV with cable channels and air conditioning. Some rooms have a living area and balconies with sea views. Hardman Praia includes a restaurant serving local and international food. There is an outfitted gym with cardio and fitness activities and a games room. The property has a 24-hour reception and parking (fees may apply).

name: Transamerica Prestige Recife - Boa Viagem
address: Av. Boa Viagem, 420 - Boa Viagem, Recife 51130-000
description: The Transamérica Prestige Recife – Boa Viagem hotel is located in Recife, right across Boa Viagem Beach. It features an outdoor pool, a modern gym and 24-hour room service. Wi-Fi is free. The air-conditioned rooms of this 4-star hotel offer a luxurious décor, and boast scenic sea views. All feature a minibar, cable TV and living room. Transamérica Prestige Recife – Boa Viagem serves tropical fruits and breads at the buffet breakfast. Guests can enjoy exotic drinks on the terrace, or taste international and local cuisines at the restaurant. Gilberto Freyre International Airport is only 6.6 km from the hotel, and Pernambuca Convention Centre is 11 km away. Recife Shopping Centre can be reached within a 5-minute drive.

name: Best Western Premier Maceio
description: Discover Best Western Premier Maceio located at Pajucara Beach in Maceio, Alagoas. Enjoy the ocean views from our ocean front suites or spend some time at the pool on the top floor, where steam room is also located. It is possible to relax at the sauna or have a massage, a haircut or make-up. The fitness center is totally equipped with high-end equipment for strength or cardio. The games room, kids club or a kids' kitchen area is there to make a perfect stay for your family. Events area for up to 500 attendees and others smaller are ready to host your event. Le Premier Restaurant serves regional and international food making a fusion cuisine ready for any taste. On Saturday lunches you can appreciate our famous "feijoada" with "caipirinha" and live samba. The rooms range from 32 square meters for our standard rooms to 120 square meters for our Presidential Suite. Our Presidential Suite includes a large balcony with a hot tub for two people and an ocean front view. All our rooms include a 40-inch LCD cable TV or greater, coffee maker, iron, minibar, electronic safe, air conditioning, local art craft and a view to the sea, sometimes partial. Wi-Fi is free. Parking costs extra and is subject to availability.bestwestern.com

name: Kristie Resort
description: Right on Ponta Negra beach, Kristie Hotel Natal features 2 adult pools, a children pool and buffet breakfast, plus a spacious sun terrace. Accommodation is offered in 2 buildings. The first building, Kristie Beach is beachfront. At the second building, Kristie Flat, rooms come with a kitchen and seating area and are located just behind the main building. Both buildings share the same common and leisure areas. Kristie Hotel is 3 km from Natal Convention Centre. São Gonçalo do Amarante International Airport is 40 km away. Parking is free. This hotel offers direct access to Ponta Negra beach. A daily buffet breakfast is served and includes homemade items and fresh fruit.

name: Laguna Praia Hotel
description: Boasting stunning sea views from the pool, Laguna Praia Hotel is ideally located in front of Tambau Beach. WiFi is complimentary throughout. Modern and bright rooms at Laguna Hotel have a balcony, a cable TV, a minibar and air conditioning. At the restaurant, guests can enjoy seafood and other Brazilian dishes. The daily buffet breakfast offers a variety of tropical items, as well as a selection of regional delicacies. Guests can unwind by the pool facing the ocean, where special drinks and cocktails can be served from the rooftop bar. Hotel Laguna Praia is 1 km from Cabo Branco Beach and 6 km from Ponta do Seixas. Presidente Castro Pinto Airport is 25 km away, while downtown João Pessoa is 7 km far. The famous Jacaré Beach is 13 km away.

name: Hotel Luzeiros São Luis
address: Rua João Pereira Damasceno, 2, São Luiz 65077-630
description: Hotel Luzeiros São Luis is just a short walk from Ponta do Farol Beach in São Luis. It has a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in São Luís. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Private parking is available on site. The Luzeiros’s air-conditioned rooms feature an LCD TV with cable channels, minibar, safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a continental or buffet breakfast. The property also offers a restaurants serving international cuisine. The 5-star hotel also features a sauna and a sun terrace. Sao Marcos Beach is located only 300 metres from the property, while São Luis historic centre is 4.5 km away. The nearest airport is Marechal Cunha Machado International Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Rio Búzios Beach Hotel
description: This 3-star Búzios hotel is just 60 metres from João Fernandes Beach. Luxury amenities include an outdoor pool, a sauna and free Wi-Fi. Rooms have balconies and flat-screen TVs. Hotel Rio Búzios offers bright, spacious rooms decorated with log furniture. Each has picturesque views of the slopes of Búzios and the Atlantic coast. Guests can unwind in the hot tub after a workout in Hotel Rio’s fitness centre. A games room offering table tennis and videogames is provided as well. The à la carte restaurant at Rio Búzios offers a mix of Brazilian and international cuisine while drinks can be enjoyed at the bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The property is only 350 metres from Orla Bardot waterfront and 1 km from downtown Búzios. Guests organising local excursions can benefit from the on-site tour desk, bicycle and car rental services.

name: Vitoria Praia Hotel
address: Av Dante Michelini 1057 Jardim Da Penha, Vitória 29065-051
description: Welcome to Vitória Praia Hotel!! Our hotel is strategically located in the Jardim da Penha region, on the edge of Praia de Camburi, 4 KM from Eurico Salles de Aguiar Airport and just 3.5 Km from the city's main shopping mall, Shopping Vitória. It is close to the Convention Center and important business centers in the city, banks, and with easy access to the BR 101 and BR 262 highways. Vitória Praia Hotel has 80 apartments distributed in Superior and Luxury categories, equipped with Air Conditioning, Cable TV, Safe and Internet. We offer several services to meet the needs of the most varied types of guests, from corporate to leisure, in addition to offering free parking, subject to availability. The Hotel also has a complete event space with capacity for 80 people in an auditorium format. The hotel's gastronomy is signed by the Guest restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner daily, in addition to delicious drinks.

name: Vidam Hotel Aracaju - Transamerica Collection
address: Rua Dr. Bezerra de Menezes, 40, Aracaju 49035-300
description: With a stay at Vidam Hotel Aracaju in Aracaju (Atalaia), you'll be a 4-minute walk from Aracaju Oceanarium and 7 minutes by foot from Atalaia Square. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided at no charge.Hotels.com

name: Camboriú Praia Hotel
description: Camboriú Praia Hotel is 60 metres from Balneário Camboriú’s beachfront, featuring an indoor pool and a sauna. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Private parking is available for a surcharge. The air conditioned rooms at Camboriú Praia Hotel boast white interiors, with tiled floors and comfortable beds all equipped with a minibar, a TV and private bathroom. A daily breakfast buffet with seasonal fruits, natural juices are available. Guests can enjoy international cuisine at the restaurant, and have refreshing drinks at the bar. Due to its ideal location, the hotel is within 1 km from several fresh seafood restaurants and bars. Other facilities at the hotel include a fitness centre, and games room. The front desk is available 24 hours a day. This hotel is 37 km from Navegantes Airport, and 78 km from Hercilio Luz Airport.

name: Holiday Inn Fortaleza
description: Beachside Fortaleza Holiday Inn Hotel Situated along the shores of Iracema Beach, the Holiday Inn® Fortaleza Hotel is an ideal retreat for your business trip or vacation. From outstanding service to a prime location near Beira-Mar Avenue on the coast of Fortaleza, this hotel has everything you expect and more. The nearby Dragão do Mar Center of Art & Culture, just six minutes away, offers plenty of entertainment, including museums, a cinema and a planetarium. If you're looking for handcrafts, the Central Market has four floors with many options. You can also enjoy Futuro beach, located just ten minutes from the hotel by car. As our hotel's guest, you will enjoy great perks such as an outdoor pool, a Fitness Center and the Baby's Kitchen, where parents can prepare food for their kids, as well as two restaurants, one of which offers a free breakfast buffet. The Kids Club and Play Room ensure on-site entertainment for the entire family. The hotel also features a Business Center and different conference rooms that accommodate groups of up to 120 people. We look forward to seeing you at our privileged beach location in the Holiday Inn® Fortaleza Hotel. Holiday Inn Fortaleza is a 100% non smoking hotel. It will be charge a cleaning tax if the guest smoked at the room.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Manary Praia Hotel
description: Rising on the sands of the beautiful Ponta Negra Beach, the Manary Praia Hotel invites you to have a restful time in its spacious rooms and on the hammocks found on their balconies. The building has a neocolonial-style architecture and offers several leisure options, such as swimming pools for adults and children. All comfortable rooms of Manary Praia are air conditioned, fitted with a balcony, cable TV and a minibar. From some room categories, you will be able to admire a view of the beach and as an extra, free toiletries are provided. The Manary Hotel also provides a poolside bar and restaurant with beautiful sea views, as well as room service during limited hours. It is only 2 km to reach Morro do Careca and within a 300 metres radio guests will find several shops, restaurants and bars. To get to the airport, guests will take more or less one hour by car, since it is 34 km away.

name: Hotel Doral Guarujá
description: Located right in front of the Praia de Enseada beach and 100 km from São Paulo, Doral Guarujá offers an outdoor pool, a children's pool, a pool bar and a restaurant. Guests can enjoy the fitness centre and a games room. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Boasting a balcony, air-conditioned room at Doral Guarujá have a bright and modern décor, as well as a minibar and a cable TV. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served each morning in the restaurant. Guests can also enjoy beach service that offers chairs, umbrellas and towels. The hotel is 4.3 km from Pernambuco Beach, 6 km from La Plage Shopping Centre and 2 km from the city´s Aquarium. Guarulhos International Airport is 120 km away.

name: Hotel Praia Do Portinho
description: This 3-star hotel is in front of Ilhabela´s marine sanctuary of Portinho Beach. It features modern accommodation with a balcony, free Wi-Fi and free parking, plus a heated pool. Rooms at Hotel Praia do Portinho have a clean and stylish decoration. They all feature a LCD TV and a minibar. Air conditioning and ceiling fans are also provided. Hotel Praia do Portinho's facilities have a spacious entertainment lounge. The hotel´s parking lot offers 24-hour security. Guests can relax with drinks at the bar or have a meal in the restaurant. The buffet breakfast offers a variety of tropical items.

name: Upg Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi and a sun terrace, UPG Hotel offers accommodation in Ubatuba, 40 metres from Praia Grande. Free private parking is available on site. Breakfast is available. A flat-screen TV, en suite, and air conditioning are standard in all rooms at UPG Hotel. Some rooms include views of the sea or mountains. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Plus, a tour desk and shared TV lounge are available to all guests throughout their stay. Praia Vermelha is 1.9 km from UPG Hotel, while Ubatuba Aquarium and Projeto Tamar is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel La Foret & Beach Club
address: Rua 11 Quadra G Lotes 39 East 40, Búzios
description: Located 400 metres from Joao Fernandes Beach, Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club features 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Guests also enjoy access to an exclusive beach leisure area at Club La Plage, 400 metres away. Each room is air-conditioned. Accommodation at Hotel La Forêt & Beach Club includes a private bathroom and a balcony with a hammock. The hotel’s tour desk can offer advice on excursions. Guests can enjoy a sauna or a massage session at Club La Plage´s spa. The club features a submerged bar, a fitness area, a beauty parlour and a beachfront restaurant with a variety of dishes. Breakfast is offered at La Foret’s restaurant. The hotel’s pool bar serves drinks and snacks.

name: Hotel Costamar
description: Hotel Costamar Ponta Verde offers Cozy rooms with free Wi-Fi, outdoor pool and panoramic restaurant. During your stay at the hotel you can enjoy the natural pools of Pajuçara beach and visit the local handicraft fair. The hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, cable TV, minibar and hairdryer. The rooftop restaurant at the Costamar serves regional cuisine. A daily breakfast buffet with fresh fruits, natural juices and pastries is available. Free limited parking is available on a first come, first serve basis.

name: Pousada Refúgio da Harmonia
description: No description found

name: Radisson Hotel Recife
description: Situated on beautiful Boa Viagem Beach, Radisson Hotel Recife provides a simply delightful stay for both business and leisure travelers. When you are not enjoying the nearby surf and sand, you can peruse the boutiques at nearby Marco Zero Square or learn more about Brazilian culture at the Ricardo Brennand Institute. No matter what is on your itinerary, you can start each morning with a free breakfast at Nabuco, our on-site restaurant. Additional hotel amenities include a fitness center, an outdoor pool, and nine contemporary meeting rooms. In the evening, retire to one of our 149 guest rooms, each equipped with free WiFi and a coffeemaker. For an upgraded stay, book a room or suite with stunning oceanfront views. Plus, you can earn rewards, including free nights and gift cards, with our Choice Privileges Rewards program.Choice Hotels

name: Porto Pacuiba Hotel Ilhabela
description: Situated in beautiful Ilhabela, on Praia do Viana, Porto Pacuíba was recently renovated and offers spacious accommodation. Guests can enjoy on-site amenities, which include an indoor pool, a heated outdoor pool with a wet bar, three Japanese hot tubs for adults and a children's hot tub, a deck with panoramic ocean views, and free parking. Rooms at Porto Pacuíba Hotel feature silent air conditioning and a Smart LCD satellite TV with over 90 TV channels, music and Netflix. Some accommodations also feature a hot tub and a balcony with a private hammock overlooking the sea or garden. Run by Chef Lucas Figueiredo, the Portofino Restaurant has an international menu with a hint of local cuisine. Guests can also enjoy the breakfast buffet, which includes more than 50 options of homemade cakes, jams and cheeses. You can also relax by the pool with a drink from the hotel bar, enjoy a revitalizing massage at the spa and use the sauna. For your convenience, free WiFi is available throughout the hotel.
